thread.title: Banc Intranets Forms Strategic Marketing Partnership with All Clear System
thread.title_full: Banc Intranets Forms Strategic Marketing Partnership with All Clear System

author: President and Chief Executive Officer Mark Anderson
title: Banc Intranets Forms Strategic Marketing Partnership with All Clear System
text:
Banc Intranets recently entered into a strategic partnership with Bank Secure Technology LLC, DBA All Clear System. The agreement will enable both Johnson City, Tenn.-based firms to work synergistically to promote similar products to the same market. All Clear System is a cloud-based safety product that caters to organizations in the financial, commercial and services sectors. The software, which is sold by a renewable subscription, enhances the security of employees during opening, closing and any other time another set of watchful eyes is needed.
All Clear System will take advantage of Banc Intranet’s enterprise content management platform to train its clients on its innovative software, according to Chief Executive Officer Matthew Bolton, Sr. From a broader perspective, Banc Intranets and All Clear System will join forces in the area of business development. Essentially, the companies will team up to identify leads and opportunities for their related products, as well as conduct joint marketing efforts whenever possible.
“Banc Intranets is pleased to be able to collaborate with All Clear System to promote products that can help financial institutions and other organizations enhance their operations,” says Banc Intranets President and Chief Executive Officer Mark Anderson. “We cater to similar segments of the business community, and it only makes sense to work together to connect with our target market as effectively as we can.”
“We are very excited about the joint marketing arrangement with Banc Intranets,” Bolton says. “All of the products we have are 100 percent complementary and can help organizations be the best they can be.”
All Clear System will be employing Banc Intranets’ Learning Management System to facilitate training on its safety product. The Learning Management System provides a secure web-based environment where employees can locate the learning information they need, start the learning process, and demonstrate what they learned through assessments. The system enables training administrators to easily create, track, and monitor all training initiatives within their organization. For example, the Course Management feature allows administrators to create courses and schedule classes with links to other training resources. The Learning Management System is a flexible solution that includes:
 Learning Plans that deliver the most appropriate courses to each employee My Learning Plan that makes training requirements immediately available to students Real-time reporting that provides management with current and detailed training records In-depth reporting that ensures all employees are compliant with all training initiatives
The Learning Management System is an integrated component of BancWorks, Banc Intranets’ flagship intranet product. BancWorks is a turn-key solution that gives employees convenient and immediate access to important corporate information. It’s a secure online portal that provides a single place where organizations can share the latest news, announcements, policies, procedures and more.
Banc Intranets also offers an innovative board portal known as DirectorsLink. It gives authorized users secure and instant access to information about their organization—anywhere and anytime. They can log into the system to view corporate agendas, financial reports, loan packages, procedures and other relevant information. Banc Intranets also offers custom web sites, web site hosting and dedicated technical support for all of its solutions.
To learn more about Banc Intranets and its innovative content management solutions, please visit http://www.bancintranets.com or contact Mark Anderson at 423-926-8527. For more information about All Clear System, contact Matthew Bolton, Sr. at 423-676-9821.
About Banc Intranets LLC
Established in 2002, Banc Intranets LLC is a leading enterprise content management provider whose innovative products save clients money, time and other resources. The company—whose motto is Bringing People and Information Together—delivers a variety of software and web-based solutions to meet the needs of financial, health care, nonprofit and other industries. Its DirectorsLink, BancWorks, Learning Management System and custom web sites help clients improve the delivery and management of information among their employees, executives and board members. Headquartered in Johnson City, Tenn., Banc Intranets serves clients throughout the United States, U.S. territories, Canada and Caribbean.
